price: Kuma suka ce: "Zukatanmu suna cikin rufi." A'a, Allah Yã la'ane su, dõmin kafircinsu kadan kwarai suke yin ĩmãni!
arabic: وَقَالُواْ قُلُوبُنَا غُلۡفُۢۚ بَل لَّعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِكُفۡرِهِمۡ فَقَلِيلٗا مَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqālū qulūbunā ghul'fun bal laʿanahumu al-lahu bikuf'rihim faqalīlan mā yu'minūna
